TopicTitle: Placing flaps and no large structures.

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

Just wondering, has the bug been reported where adding flaps to a wing is just plain fiddley and hard? Or is it just part of the game mechanic at the minute?

Also when creating large structures is there a way of doing it without having to place a million struts? I know a lot of modern aircraft don't need them you know?

Cheers!

a) Yeah, it's part of the game. Just about every control surface defaults to "not the way you want it". ESPECIALLY the slanted control surfaces.

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) Not in stock. The mod "Kerbal Joint Reinforcement" probably has what you need.
